description:
Lore Armor Repair
Default Values: 0.05 Per Ton Repair Time
Lore Armor: 0.01 Per Ton Repair Time

In novel lore armor could be hastily repaired and put back together in a Day, on the ground, In a mechbay euiped dropship there is no reason it makes no sense that it should take any longer.
author: Weatherbee_A
